proposal: Understanding the essence of Mystiko V1, aiming to enhance blockchain scalability, interoperability, and confidentiality, is impressive. Congrats on reaching 36 holders on the ETH network! Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools, empowering your community to contribute directly to your vision while benefiting from revenue sharing. Let's make Web3 not just scalable and confidential but also more rewarding for everyone involved.
